mapper.select: SELECT fee_id, fee.classify_code, fee.whole_fee, fee.inner_fee, fee.outer_fee, fee.operation_type, fee.create_username, fee.create_date, fee.modify_username, fee.modify_date FROM hx_fee_movemachine AS fee INNER JOIN hx_product_classify AS product ON fee.classify_code = product.classify_code, hx_code INNER JOIN hx_code_setting ON hx_code_setting.code_id = hx_code.code_id WHERE fee.classify_code = product.classify_code AND hx_code_setting.code_id = 'mcm' AND hx_code_setting.code_key = fee.operation_type

SELECT fee.fee_id, product.classify_name as classify_code, fee.whole_fee, fee.inner_fee, fee.outer_fee, fee.create_username, fee.create_date, fee.modify_username, fee.modify_date, hx_code_setting.code_value as operation_type FROM hx_fee_movemachine AS fee INNER JOIN hx_product_classify AS product ON fee.classify_code = product.classify_code INNER JOIN hx_code_setting ON hx_code_setting.code_key = fee.operation_type WHERE fee_id =#{feeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND hx_code_setting.code_id='mcm'

SELECT fee.fee_id, product.classify_code as classify_code, fee.whole_fee, fee.inner_fee, fee.outer_fee, fee.create_username, fee.create_date, fee.modify_username, fee.modify_date, hx_code_setting.code_key as operation_type FROM hx_fee_movemachine AS fee INNER JOIN hx_product_classify AS product ON fee.classify_code = product.classify_code INNER JOIN hx_code_setting ON hx_code_setting.code_key = fee.operation_type WHERE fee_id =#{feeID,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND hx_code_setting.code_id='mcm'
